Interface_name: TCP client based on socket_* in PHP
Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a Radius class in PHP that handles RADIUS protocol communication for authentication and accounting purposes using UDP sockets.

Class Description: The Radius class provides functionality to communicate with a RADIUS server for authentication (Access-Request) and accounting operations. It handles packet construction, socket communication, and response parsing according to RADIUS protocol standards.

Attributes:

_ip_radius_server: [string] - IP address of the RADIUS server
_shared_secret: [string] - Shared secret for communication with RADIUS server
_radius_suffix: [string] - Suffix to append to usernames
_udp_timeout: [int] - Timeout for UDP operations in seconds
_authentication_port: [int] - Port for authentication requests (default 1812)
_accounting_port: [int] - Port for accounting requests (default 1813)
_nas_ip_address: [string] - NAS IP address to send in requests
_nas_port: [int] - NAS port to send in requests
_encrypted_password: [string] - Encrypted password for authentication
_user_ip_address: [string] - User's IP address
_request_authenticator: [string] - Request authenticator value
_response_authenticator: [string] - Response authenticator value
_username: [string] - Username for authentication
_password: [string] - Password for authentication
_identifier_to_send: [int] - Packet identifier to send
_identifier_received: [int] - Received packet identifier
_radius_packet_to_send: [int] - RADIUS packet code to send
_radius_packet_received: [int] - Received RADIUS packet code
_attributes_to_send: [array] - Attributes to include in outgoing packets
_attributes_received: [array] - Attributes received from server
_socket_to_server: [resource] - Socket connection to server
_debug_mode: [bool] - Debug mode flag
debug_text: [array] - Debug messages
_attributes_info: [array] - RADIUS attribute information
_radius_packet_info: [array] - RADIUS packet type information
_last_error_code: [int] - Last error code
_last_error_message: [string] - Last error message

Methods:

__construct: [function]($ip_radius_server = '127.0.0.1', $shared_secret = '', $radius_suffix = '', $udp_timeout = 5, $authentication_port = 1812, $accounting_port = 1813) -> [void] - Initializes the Radius object with server details and default values

AccessRequest: [function]($username = '', $password = '', $udp_timeout = 0, $state = NULL) -> [bool] - Sends an Access-Request to the RADIUS server and returns true if authentication is successful (Access-Accept received)

SetIpRadiusServer: [function]($ip_radius_server) -> [void] - Sets the RADIUS server IP address

SetSharedSecret: [function]($shared_secret) -> [void] - Sets the shared secret for RADIUS communication

SetAuthenticationPort: [function]($authentication_port) -> [void] - Sets the authentication port

SetAccountingPort: [function]($accounting_port) -> [void] - Sets the accounting port

SetRadiusSuffix: [function]($radius_suffix) -> [void] - Sets the username suffix

SetUdpTimeout: [function]($udp_timeout) -> [void] - Sets the UDP timeout value

SetUsername: [function]($username = '') -> [void] - Sets the username for authentication

SetPassword: [function]($password = '') -> [void] - Sets the password for authentication

SetNasIpAddress: [function]($nas_ip_address = '') -> [void] - Sets the NAS IP address

SetNasPort: [function]($nas_port = 0) -> [void] - Sets the NAS port

SetPacketCodeToSend: [function]($packet_code) -> [void] - Sets the RADIUS packet code to send

SetAttribute: [function]($attribute_type, $attribute_value) -> [void] - Adds an attribute to the outgoing packet

GetNextIdentifier: [function]() -> [int] - Returns the next packet identifier

GenerateRequestAuthenticator: [function]() -> [void] - Generates a new request authenticator

DecodeAttribute: [function]($attribute_raw_value, $attribute_type) -> [mixed] - Decodes a received attribute value

ClearLastError: [function]() -> [void] - Clears the last error information

ClearDataToSend: [function]() -> [void] - Clears all data to be sent

ClearDataReceived: [function]() -> [void] - Clears all received data
